original_text: And he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord, according to all that David his father had done.
korean_text: 히스기야가 그의 조상 다윗의 모든 행실과 같이 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하여

sentences.original_text: And he did what was right in the eyes of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주의 보시기에 옳은 일을 행하였고,

sentences.original_text: according to all that David his father had done.
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 아버지 다윗이 행한 모든 일대로 하였더라.
